ModMetaData.name: More Pain Genes
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
This mod replaces the Extra Pain Gene's wimp trait with a pain factor of 150%. It also adds 5 more pain genes which added change the pain factor by 200%, 175%, 125%, 25%, and 0%. If you are using alpha genes, this will replace their painless with my cheaper version.
[url=https://discord.gg/fYP8qkcNDh]Discord link[/url] for those who want an easier way to ask questions, make requests, or just chat. I'll also be posting new releases there.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/alite/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Easy link to all of my Rimworld mods[/url]
[url=https://github.com/KonradHeinser/MorePainGenes][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url] [url=https://ko-fi.com/alite56114][img]https://i.imgur.com/Utx6OIH.png[/img][/url]
